summary: Replaces the music that plays on death with the death sound from the classic Super Mario games.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#66CCFF]Description:[/color][/size]

This is a simple mod that replaces the music that plays on death with the death sound from the classic Super Mario games.


[center][youtube]lxHmExZa8EA[/youtube][/center]


[size=4][color=#66CCFF]Installation:[/color][/size]

[b][color=#66FF33]NMM Users:[/color][/b] Just click the \"Download With Manager\" button and activate it in NMM.

[b][color=yellow]Wrye Bash Users:[/color][/b] Already a simple package - just drag \'n\' drop into your Bash Installers folder and activate with BAIN.

[b][color=gray]Manual:[/color][/b] Simply extract the \'music\' folder found in this archive into your Skyrim \'Data\' directory. By default, it should be in:
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data



[size=4][color=#66CCFF]Un-installation:[/color][/size]

Simply deactivate the mod with whichever mod managing utility you used to install it, or delete the files that you installed if you did it manually.


[size=4][color=#66CCFF]My Other Mods:[/color][/size]
[list]
[*][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2973=]The REAL Fus Ro Dah -Unrelenting Force Shout from Trailer-[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11108]CF Custom Realistic Lighting ini[/url]
[/list]


[size=4][color=#66CCFF]Tools Used/Credits:[/color][/size]
[list]
[*]Audacity
[*]FOMM\'S BSA Browser
[*]DirectX SDK (June 2010)
[/list]
author: xchargerfanx
